name: Tesla Boy: Robot Time Traveller
summary:
Reach new dimensions as you play as Tesla Boy, a time traveling robot who must find his creator. Reach blazing speeds while on the ground or catch a jetpack and soar to the skies as you turbo boost through space to find hidden treasures.
Play against friends on this futurist adventure. A complete platformer with incredible landscapes to explore and stacks of explosive power ups that can boost you into a whole new dimension of fun!
Simple, yet addictive one button game play controls to bounce or fly over mysterious monsters and challenging traps. Collect new treasures that help you race through time to find your almighty creator.
